languages.text: "Я была одной из лучших среди сверстниц. И была отобрана для послушничества в рядах {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. В свой час прошла испытания и приняла обеты. Самый радостный день моей жизни! Свет {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} был со мной всегда, но принять его всем сердцем, произнести клятвы — это особое упоение".

traits.locale_text: "Я была одной из лучших среди сверстниц. И была отобрана для послушничества в рядах {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. В свой час прошла испытания и приняла обеты. Самый радостный день моей жизни! Свет {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} был со мной всегда, но принять его всем сердцем, произнести клятвы — это особое упоение".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."
languages.original_text: "Я была одной из лучших среди сверстниц. И была отобрана для послушничества в рядах {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. В свой час прошла испытания и приняла обеты. Самый радостный день моей жизни! Свет {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} был со мной всегда, но принять его всем сердцем, произнести клятвы — это особое упоение".

traits.locale_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the Adepta Sororitas. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The Emperor's light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the Adepta Sororitas. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The Emperor's light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor's{/g} light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我是同龄人中的佼佼者，被选为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的见习修女。当那重要的时刻到来时，我通过了考验，宣读了我的誓词。那是我人生中最快乐的一天！尽管{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的光明一直伴随着我，但全心全意地接受祂的光芒，许下那些誓言时——那简直是一种无与伦比的狂喜。”
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: “我是同龄人中的佼佼者，被选为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的见习修女。当那重要的时刻到来时，我通过了考验，宣读了我的誓词。那是我人生中最快乐的一天！尽管{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的光明一直伴随着我，但全心全意地接受祂的光芒，许下那些誓言时——那简直是一种无与伦比的狂喜。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the Adepta Sororitas. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The Emperor's light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

languages.text: «Fui una de las mejores entre mi clase y fui elegida para ser una de las novicias del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Cuando llegó mi hora, superé las pruebas y presté juramento. ¡Fue el día más feliz de mi vida! La luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} siempre me ha acompañado, pero aceptarla con todo mi corazón y prestar los juramentos... es un placer sin parangón».
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: «Fui una de las mejores entre mi clase y fui elegida para ser una de las novicias del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Cuando llegó mi hora, superé las pruebas y presté juramento. ¡Fue el día más feliz de mi vida! La luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} siempre me ha acompañado, pero aceptarla con todo mi corazón y prestar los juramentos... es un placer sin parangón».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は同期の中でも上位に位置していた。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の修練女に選ばれたのだ。その時が来て、私は試験に合格し、誓いを立てた。人生で最も喜ばしい日だった！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の光はいつも私と共にあったが、それを心から受け入れ、誓いを口にすることは、他では味わえないほどの歓びだった」
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: 「私は同期の中でも上位に位置していた。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の修練女に選ばれたのだ。その時が来て、私は試験に合格し、誓いを立てた。人生で最も喜ばしい日だった！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の光はいつも私と共にあったが、それを心から受け入れ、誓いを口にすることは、他では味わえないほどの歓びだった」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich gehörte zu den Besten. Und ich wurde für das Noviziat in den Reihen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} ausgewählt. Als die Stunde kam, bestand ich die Prüfungen und leistete meinen Eid. Der freudigste Tag meines Lebens! Das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} war immer bei mir, doch es mit ganzem Herzen zu akzeptieren, den Eid zu leisten — das ist eine Entrückung sondergleichen."
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehörte zu den Besten. Und ich wurde für das Noviziat in den Reihen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} ausgewählt. Als die Stunde kam, bestand ich die Prüfungen und leistete meinen Eid. Der freudigste Tag meines Lebens! Das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} war immer bei mir, doch es mit ganzem Herzen zu akzeptieren, den Eid zu leisten — das ist eine Entrückung sondergleichen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je figurais parmi les meilleures. Et j'ai été sélectionnée pour le noviciat dans les rangs des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Le moment venu, j'ai passé les épreuves et prononcé mes vœux. C'était le plus beau jour de mon existence ! La lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ne m'a jamais quittée, mais l'accepter au plus profond de son cœur, en prêtant serment, m'a plongée dans une extase incomparable. »
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: « Je figurais parmi les meilleures. Et j'ai été sélectionnée pour le noviciat dans les rangs des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Le moment venu, j'ai passé les épreuves et prononcé mes vœux. C'était le plus beau jour de mon existence ! La lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ne m'a jamais quittée, mais l'accepter au plus profond de son cœur, en prêtant serment, m'a plongée dans une extase incomparable. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Akranlarım arasında en iyilerindendim. Bu sebeple {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} saflarında acemilik eğitimi almak üzere seçildim. Vakit geldiğinde imtihanlarımı geçip yeminlerimi ettim. Hayatımın en mutlu günüydü! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} ışığı daima içimdeydi ama onu tüm kalbimle kabul etmek, ant içmek... Böylesi bir istiğraka başka türlü erilmez."
languages.original_text: "I was one of the best among my peers. And I was selected for the novitiate in the ranks of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. When the hour came, I passed the trials and took my vows. The most joyous day of my life! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s light has always been with me, but to accept it with all your heart, to utter the oaths — that is a rapture like no other."

traits.locale_text: "Akranlarım arasında en iyilerinden biriydim. Bu sebeple {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} saflarında talebelik etmek için seçildim. Vakit geldiğinde imtihanlarımı geçip yeminlerimi ettim. Hayatımın en mutlu günüydü! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un ışığı daima içimdeydi ama onu tüm kalbimle kabul etmek, ant içmek... Böylesi bir istiğraka başka türlü erilmez."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
